name: Paint
description:
Sprinkle even more hues into FigJam and paint your Jams with your brand colors! The default set of swatches includes a set of useful swatches which are not available in FigJam natively such as TRUE RED™, bright blue and pink.


Use your own colors

Get styles from the file: open a Figma file with some solid color styles and run the “Save Colors” command.


Get colors from selected objects: select some color swatches (rectangles or ellipses would do, but you can use anything) and run “Save Colors” command.
